titleStmt.title: The Kings return. A sermon preached at Winchcomb in Gloucestershire upon the Kings-day, Thursday, May 24. 1660. By Clement Barksdale.
titleStmt.author: Barksdale, Clement, 1609-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Royston at the Angel in Ivye-lane,
